column5: (for R&D-purposes only, final specification to be determined)

column1: levels of contaminats and background doping low enough to allow for a reasonable VCSEL performance

column5: (until production data from ~200 wafers is collected, wafers with Etalon-in-spec Area >65% are also accepted)

column1: additional spec for doping: average Si-signal in inner nDBRs (layers 6-9) below 1.5E18 1/ccm as measured by SIMS

column2: Tunnel junction with additional oxide aperture
